QxtScgiServerConnector Class Reference
[QxtWeb module]

An SCGI connector for QxtHttpSessionManager. More... 

 #include <QxtScgiServerConnector>

Inherits QxtAbstractHttpConnector.

  • List of all members, including inherited members

Public Functions

  • QxtScgiServerConnector ( QObject * parent = 0 )

Detailed Description

QxtScgiServerConnector implements the SCGI protocoll supported by almost all modern web servers.

See also: QxtHttpSessionManager

Member Documentation

QxtScgiServerConnector ( QObject * parent = 0 )

Creates a QxtHttpServerConnector with the given parent.
